data.message:
Like always whenever u get annoyed,by touching me u gets happy,
did u forget whenever u got upset,i used to b reason of your every smile
did u forget that i was the only reason for u to live.

Like always v r walking together by holding each other hands.
Now em all alone n seeking u in the darkness of life,
waiting for such moment,
van v r together and start again walking by holding each other hands.

Like always v r walking together by holding each other hands.

"no lov3 boundri3z"
